name: Pixel Party (Malaphar)
description:
---✧   Now with longer time limits!   ✧---

Player 1 controls: Use A and D to move the brush horizontally

Player 2 controls: Use Up and Down arrows to move the brush vertically

Press Enter to move to the next level

Made by Madeline Elmore

Everything is mine except for the audio and fonts: Free Casual SoundFX Pack by Tim Beck
8Bit Music by GWriterStudio
Mac OS StartUp sound alike by DeVern
Rainy Hearts font by Camellina
